title: 199: The Master and Margarita
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: During Stalin's regime in Russia there was one author daring enough to write a Satire . . . one that I can't quite nail down. I ask Graeme to help me.
itunes:author: Azazello, Koroviev, Behemoth
itunes:subtitle: Black magic shows in Russia? Seems like a rough night.
itunes:summary: During Stalin's regime in Russia there was one author daring enough to write a Satire . . . one that I can't quite nail down. I ask Graeme to help me.
itunes:title: 199: The Master and Margarita
